text: Kejvi Bardhi (born 7 August 1996 in Laç) is an Albanian football player who currently plays for KF Laçi in the Albanian Superliga.Soccerway profileFSHF profile ==Controversies== In October 2016, Bardhi was arrested after he was accused of causing a collision of three cars including a police car on a crossroads between Laç and Fushë Krujë. Bardhi was reportedly driving too fast and the accident left three people injured.Aksidentoi makinën e policisë, arrestohet djali i kryebashkiakut të Laçit. Fshihej në Tiranë - BalaknWeb In 2017, he allegedly posted a picture of himself on social media while driving a car with a gun on his lap. ==Personal life== Kejvi is a son of Kurbin mayor Arthur Bardhi.“Lëviz si shefat me pistoletë në qytet, ky është djali i kryebashkiakut që…” - Panorama ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Laç Category:Association football forwards Category:Albanian footballers Category:KF Laçi players Category:KF Elbasani players Category:Albanian Superliga players
